name: Leg Press (Narrow Stance)
how_to_perform:
1. Sit down at a leg press machine with your feet shoulder-width apart on the platform, close to together.

2. Place the heel of one foot on the edge of the platform closest to you and push through your heel to extend your knee fully.

3. Make sure to keep your back straight against the backrest and engage your core to maintain a stable base.

4. Hold the weight for a brief moment at the top of the movement, squeezing the muscles in your legs.

5. Slowly lower the platform by bending your knee until you feel a stretch in the front of your leg.

6. Push through your heel again to return the platform to the starting position.

7. Repeat this process with the other leg.
short_summary: The Leg Press (Narrow Stance) is an exercise that targets the quadriceps, glutes, and calves muscles by performing a narrow stance on the leg press machine.
